name: Blind Cricket Association
briefDescription: 'Blind Cricket association' ( BCA ) is a registered Society based in Delhi, it consists of members of the blind cricket fraternity from across the country as well as spirited individuals who have an authentic passion to enhance the lives of the visually challenged young men and women.At the outset, Blind cricket is not a commercial proposition but a unique rehabilitation program to encourage blind people to lead physically fit, confident and well rounded lives without being dependent on anyone.  We believe that making blind cricket popular will help change the mindset towards disability in India.The main objective behind launching 'Blind Cricket association' ( BCA ), with the motto of ‘Cricket in true spirit’ is to re focus on the true
